function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate quarantine facilities and procedures during 19th-century Ottoman Empire","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading through incoming travelers","Mitigation":"Establishment of effective quarantine facilities and protocols for incoming travelers","Technologies":"Medical screening technology, isolation facilities, communication technology for contact tracing","People":"Travelers, local residents","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate housing infrastructure for quarantine during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within apartment buildings","Mitigation":"Promotion of proper ventilation, sanitation, and social distancing measures within apartment buildings","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, sanitation technology, communication technology for public health guidance","People":"Apartment residents, building owners, property managers","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, property managers"}]}
